Uses of Interface
org.attoparser.select.ISelectionAwareMarkupHandler

Packages that use ISelectionAwareMarkupHandler
org.attoparser.select Handlers for filtering a part or several parts of markup during parsing in a fast and efficient way. 
 

Uses of ISelectionAwareMarkupHandler in org.attoparser.select
 

Classes in org.attoparser.select that implement ISelectionAwareMarkupHandler
 class AttributeMarkingSelectedMarkupHandler
           Implementation of the ISelectionAwareMarkupHandler that adds an attribute (with a user-specified name) to all elements that match one or more selectors, as determined by a BlockSelectorMarkupHandler or NodeSelectorMarkupHandler handler.
